{\rtf1 certainly familiar with the term but I}

{\rtf1 textbooks approaches so I want to define}
{\rtf1 that I look at some approaches and then}
{\rtf1 I want to talk about specifically}
{\rtf1 reporting audience analysis to clients}

{\rtf1 and then I want to tie this to our}
{\rtf1 recommendation report so what is}
{\rtf1 audience analysis I would argue that}
{\rtf1 audience analysis is primarily a}
{\rtf1 research method which isn't really what}
{\rtf1 the textbooks would argue but I think}
{\rtf1 that's what they're saying without}
{\rtf1 actually explicitly saying that and so I}
{\rtf1 would argue that audience analysis is}
{\rtf1 primarily a research method for}
{\rtf1 systematically gathering and analyzing}
{\rtf1 information about our intended audiences}
{\rtf1 okay so it's a way of understanding and}
{\rtf1 learning about our audiences but the}
{\rtf1 audience analysis part of it really is}
{\rtf1 hopefully a systematic method}
{\rtf1 so since audience analysis I'm arguing}
{\rtf1 is the systematic way of understanding}
{\rtf1 and gathering information about our}
{\rtf1 audience I want to present to you a}
{\rtf1 cattle model of data-driven audience}
{\rtf1 analysis and cata stands for collect}
{\rtf1 analyze triangulate and apply and this}
{\rtf1 is a model that I came up with and that}
{\rtf1 I use in my classes to teach students}
{\rtf1 about collecting and analyzing data but}
{\rtf1 before we can get into the cata model}
{\rtf1 first I think we need to}
{\rtf1 as editors and as technical}
{\rtf1 communicators it's important to first}
{\rtf1 identify your audience and really we're}
{\rtf1 thinking about audience in this in this}
{\rtf1 case in the identify stage really}
{\rtf1 generally right so who is your primary}
{\rtf1 audience who's the main decision-maker}
{\rtf1 or stakeholder who's your secondary}
{\rtf1 audience who are some other people that}
{\rtf1 will read this piece of communication}
{\rtf1 and also potentially make a decision and}
{\rtf1 then who's your tertiary audience who}
{\rtf1 are the people that may read this but}
{\rtf1 don't really have a decision-making}
{\rtf1 ability or stake so for example if you}
{\rtf1 think about a marketing website primary}
{\rtf1 audience is going to be a customer right}
{\rtf1 so we're thinking very generally our}
{\rtf1 secondary audience might be family}
{\rtf1 members of a customer right someone that}
{\rtf1 makes a decision like a parent so I'm}
{\rtf1 thinking as a parent something that's}
{\rtf1 trying to sell you know a website that's}
{\rtf1 trying to sell a new toy to a kid well}
{\rtf1 the primary stakeholder may be the}

{\rtf1 secondary stakeholder might be the child}
{\rtf1 depending on the age of the child and}

{\rtf1 who is going to purchase a toy for this}
{\rtf1 child right so when we're talking about}
{\rtf1 in the identify stage we're really}

{\rtf1 purchasing what are their attitudes}
{\rtf1 towards purchasing right and so really}

{\rtf1 more details so the Cata model is}
{\rtf1 collect right so once you've identified}
{\rtf1 your primary secondary and tertiary}
{\rtf1 stakeholders you want to collect}
{\rtf1 information about them you want to learn}
{\rtf1 more about them so you want to gather as}

{\rtf1 analyzed once you've got all this}

{\rtf1 or is it just random}

{\rtf1 to be women right so that's we're}
{\rtf1 analyzing that now we're we're starting}
{\rtf1 to get some patterns and some}
{\rtf1 information out of the data}
{\rtf1 triangulate so if you've got a lot of}
{\rtf1 different data sources so you maybe you}
{\rtf1 looked on social media menu with that}
{\rtf1 competitor websites maybe you conducted}
{\rtf1 a survey and some interviews you've got}
{\rtf1 three different data sets triangulating}
{\rtf1 is really looking at all of the data and}
{\rtf1 saying which of these make sense}
{\rtf1 together what what information or data}
{\rtf1 corroborates other information and data}
{\rtf1 and then apply how do you actually what}

{\rtf1 overview macadam Otto what I want to do}

{\rtf1 communication so this idea of collecting}

{\rtf1 so as an editor where it's a little bit}

{\rtf1 of the content has already identified an}

{\rtf1 these there's limitations to each of}
